description.value: This plugin will count the number of licenses currently being consumed.

property.label: Protocol
property.description: Please select the protocol that will be used to establish the connection.

property.label: Port
property.description: Enter the port number of the webserver. The default HTTP port is 8020 and HTTPS port is 8021.

property.label: Agent Overview URL
property.description: Enter the path to the webpage to be monitored. Example: /rest/management/...

property.label: Username
property.description: Please enter a username with at least read access to the agent overview dashboard

property.label: Password
property.description: Please enter the password for the user above.

property.label: Split
property.description: Would you like to split the license count?

property.label: And Split by Agent Group
property.description: Would you like to also split by Agent Group?

property.label: Add a Filter
property.description: Would you like to filter the System Profile name?

property.label: Add a Filter
property.description: Would you like to filter the Collector name?

property.label: Add a Filter
property.description: Would you like to filter the Host name?

property.label: System Profile Name
property.description: Please enter the name of the system profile you would like to split by. Leave blank if you would like to split on all system profiles.

property.label: Collector Name
property.description: Please enter the name of the collector you would like to split by. Leave blank if you would like to split on all collectors.

property.label: Host Name
property.description: Please enter the name of the host you would like to split by. Leave blank if you would like to split on all hosts.
